StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_TestCreateContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN char(9), @ContractBeginDate date.me, @ComponentCode varchar(2), @TOE int, @PADD date.me, @ProjectedTrainingOrg int, @YouthProgramCode varchar(3) = NULL, @ENTNACSubmitDate date.me = NULL, @ENTNACCompleteDate date.me = NULL, @SpecialInterest varchar(15) = NULL, @DischargeDate date.me = NULL, @DischargeCode varchar(4) = NULL, @CatP char(1) = NULL, @DEPExtension int = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) = 'SA' AS
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128)
DECLARE @NWAID int DECLARE @ContractID int
SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA N INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND N.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'A' AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'F')
BEGIN --- GET THE NWA_ID SELECT @NWAID = N.NWA_ID FROM NWA N INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID WHERE P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND N.NWA_ID = (SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM NWA N2 WHERE N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID)
--- SELECT @NWAID
--- START THE TRANSACTION BEGIN TRANSACTION
--- INSERT CONTRACT DATA INSERT INTO CONTRACT (NWA_ID, CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, COMPONENT_CODE, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT, PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID, YOUTH_PROGRAM_CODE, ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE, ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE, SPECIAL_INTEREST, DISCHARGE_DATE, DISCHARGE_CODE, CATEGORY_P, DEP_EXTENSION, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @ContractBeginDate, @ComponentCode, @TOE, @PADD, @ProjectedTrainingOrg, @YouthProgramCode, @ENTNACSubmitDate, @ENTNACCompleteDate, @SpecialInterest, @DischargeDate, @DischargeCode, @CatP, @DEPExtension, @UserLogin, GETDATE())
--- get the iden.ty SET @ContractID = CASE WHEN @@IDENTITY IS NULL THEN (SELECT TOP 1 CONTRACT_ID FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID ORDER BY CONTRACT_ID DESC) ELSE @@IDENTITY END
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the contract record.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- INSERT CANDIDATE STATUS DATA INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_STATUS (NWA_ID, STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, STATUS_TYPE, STATUS_CODE, DISPOSITION_CODE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @ContractBeginDate, 'E', 'B', 'K', @UserLogin, GETDATE())
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the status record.', 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- INSERT PADD HISTORY DATA INSERT INTO PADD_HISTORY (CONTRACT_ID, PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, PADD_CHANGED_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ContractID, @PADD, GETDATE(), @UserLogin, GETDATE())
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RAISERROR ('An error occurred adding the padd history record.', 16, 3, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- IF WE MAKE IT HERE COMMIT THE TRANSACTION COMMIT TRANSACTION END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR ('The SSN you entered is not eligible to be contracted.', 16, 4, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
